modName: Tormund Giantsbane from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My own version of Tormund from hbo GoT tv series
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700] [size=5][b]TORMUND[/b][/size][b][size=5] Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/size][/b][/color]
[b][size=5]

[/size][size=5][size=3]Tormund is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Steel Sword.
Location : Windhelm Inn
Combat Style : Berseker 1H
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU!
HIGHLY RACCOMANDED - Face Light by [b]tktk[/b] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?
[size=3][color=#ff7700]
[Credit][/color]
[size=2][size=3]
